Impute missing weather values by station

Source: R/impute_weather.R
impute_weather.Rd

Lightweight imputers for common weather gaps. Operates per-station and returns the same rows/columns with imputed values in selected columns. Defaults are conservative (temperatures + wind speed only).

Usage

impute_weather(
  df,
  method = c("locf", "linear", "spline"),
  cols = c("tmax_c", "tmin_c", "tavg_c", "wind_spd_kmh"),
  max_gap = Inf
)

Arguments

df

Tibble with at least date and station.

method

One of "locf", "linear", "spline".

  • "locf": last observation carried forward (then backward pass).

  • "linear": piecewise linear interpolation (via approx).

  • "spline": cubic spline (stats::spline), smoothest; use with care.

cols

Character vector of columns to impute. Default: c("tmax_c","tmin_c","tavg_c","wind_spd_kmh"). (Precip/snow often have true zeros and bursts; include them explicitly if desired.)

max_gap

Integer number of days. Only interpolate runs of NAs of length <= max_gap; longer runs remain NA (applies to "linear"/"spline"). Default Inf.

Value

Tibble like df with imputed values in cols.
